answers.answer: Oh and I do have a doctors appointment tomorrow so I will be checking on this. But for my sleepless night i'd like to hear what you guys think! :)
I think your baby is coming soon...if your symptoms keep up then you should go to ur doc. Or hospital
I've been cramping like af is coming 2!!!  37 weeks here.  But diarrhea does cleanse ur body in preparation 4 the big day...so hopefully it's that!!!!
There's still so much to do!!!!  Thank you ladies!

Those are signs that labor is coming. Be careful though cause the headache could also be signs of preeclampsia. I just got diagnosed with that and had all the same symptoms. I have to be induced because of it. Make sure to talk to your Dr tomorrow. If you start getting flashing lights in your vision or blurry vision go to the ER cause it means youre for sure having preeclampsia.

question: I'm 38w tomorrow. For the past 3 days I've been under a lot of stress. I keep getting headaches from being so upset. I've been cramping like af is coming, my lower back burns, and this new one.... diarreah. It's pretty bad. Could it the stress causing it or is he almost ready to make his grand appearance?
title: Could stress be the culprit?!
